timeline.message:
Remove Derby from the following:
* Database related asadmin commands
* Core code of JBatch
Removed Derby from JDBC related code
Removed derby related code from nucleus/admin/config-api module
Removed Derby related code from nucleus folder
Removed derby related code from appserver folder
Updated the Jenkins script files to use H2 database
Update the properties on JDBC-RA to use H2 properties
Update JVM options to use H2 database
Fixed the false positive where the QuickLook tests were displaying as passing even after failing to insert data into the database
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/payara/Payara into APPSERV-22

timeline.bodyText: I assume this is not needed for H2 for some reason?
timeline.author: jbee

replies.bodyText: This was written specifically for Derby
replies.author: MeroRai

timeline.bodyText: These contains checks were changed from doing lower case (case-less) comparison to case-sensitive ones. I feel this could be a source of error. Is this a intentional change?
timeline.author: jbee
jbee

timeline.message:
* Made the database product name case-less.
* Removed the debug print line
Fixed QuickLook issue where a package was not imported
Added back the required Derby related code. This was done to support Derby during the JDBC Connection pool creation.
Fixed Could not initialize class isue on DBVendorTypeHelper
Fixed the conflicts on the domain.xml files
